name: EventON Promote
author: momothemes

sections.description:
Promote your events. Get more engagement and clients by marketing your events using the promote addon.

Let your website visitors know about the events effectively. Make any event popup on any page at any specified time. Your site visitors will definitely won’t miss it.

Attract your users’ attention to your event with the slide-in animation. Select an event to slide-in to the page when your users are on any page and force them to take notice.

Embed the event within page content like an ad banner.

All effects have mailchimp mailing form integrated.

DEMO : See Live

Documentation: Read documentation

PRO Version Features

  • Set time for event to popup, PRO
  • Set time to start slide-in event animation, PRO
sections.installation:
Installing from wp-admin

Step 1: Go to wp-admin of your website and then Plugins > Add New

Step 2: Unzip the EventON – Promote main zip file you downloaded from codecanyon

Step 3: Upload the mmt-eventon-promote.zip file to add new plugin page on your website

Step 4: Once installed activate the plugin

Installing via FTP

Step 1: unzip the EventOn – Promote plugin main zip file you downloaed from wordpress

Step 2: You will find EventOn – Promote plugin as zip file, unzip this file as well ( this file has a name like mmt-eventon-promote.zip)

Step 3: Log into your FTP client and location folder ../wp-content/plugins/

Step 4: Upload the unzipped mmt-eventon-exim folder into the plugins directory in your website
Step 5: go into WP-admin > plugins and activate EventON – Promote
